interactivity.requirements: 10 Tsuneyo Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " A Short List " from Tsuneyo Tojo
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit Tsuneyo at the School Dorms after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Sensei , visiting Tsuneyo 's dorm, tells her that the smiley face on her shirt is "kind of creepy". Tsuneyo disagrees, telling Sensei that he just hates joy — she brings up his comment that there isn't really anything he loves. The shirt was a gift from her father, whom Tsuneyo clearly respects, although she says that does not defer to him in everything. She has also been learning from Molly , although the protective "spell" she acquired is not sufficient to repel a confessed pervert like Sensei. Eventually, Tsuneyo asks Sensei to show her the way to a 24-hour convenience store — she has only just learned that they exist.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.7.
